item.title: The Forever Now
item.description: Writing this post came about from frustration with blogging. Specifically the tools I am using. Often it feels like a new language or paradigm comes along that shifts one or two of the pain points of blogging. The biggest are: How long it takes to get a post on the internet once youâ€™ve written it The reliability of the resulting website How good the resulting website looks Note that none of this really impacts the quality of the writing.
